content.en: Robotic AI Research: Scientists have been exploring various research questions related to service robots and artificial intelligence technologies, such as their key issues, development, evaluation, and diffusion. These technologies have been attributed agency in different sectors. Additionally, researchers have investigated the events, outcomes, and suggestions for future exhibitions in robot competitions, showcasing the state of the art in autonomous robots. The integration of perception, deliberation, and action in mobile robots has been a focus of study.
content.da: Robotic AI-forskning: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til servicerobotter og kunstig intelligens-teknologier, såsom deres nøglespørgsmål, udvikling, evaluering og udbredelse. Disse teknologier er blevet tilskrevet agens i forskellige sektorer. Derudover har forskere undersøgt begivenhederne, resultaterne og forslagene til fremtidige udstillinger i robotkonkurrencer, der viser det nyeste inden for autonome robotter. Integrationen af perception, overvejelse og handling i mobile robotter har været et fokuspunkt i studierne.
